scripts.build: rm -rf dist && tsc --project tsconfig.build.json && mkdir -p ./dist/managed && cp -R ./src/managed/quick-starter ./dist/managed/ && cp ./src/quick-starter.compact dist && mkdir -p ./dist/managed/quick-starter/keys && mkdir -p ./dist/managed/quick-starter/zkir && [ ! -f ./dist/managed/quick-starter/keys/index.json ] && echo '{}' > ./dist/managed/quick-starter/keys/index.json || true && [ ! -f ./dist/managed/quick-starter/zkir/index.json ] && echo '{}' > ./dist/managed/quick-starter/zkir/index.json || true
